From: Ahmad Alhamawi <Ahmad.Alhamawi@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Farah Awad <Farah.Awad@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-15 15:28
Subject: Visa and CEC / 1179547
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Please find attached residence visa copy, kindly note UAE immigration are no longer stamping visas in your passport and you will only receive your Emirates ID. 

 

For your Jafza labor card, the same is now available online only and not as a physical card.

 

You can log in to the mobile application to view the digital card by following below instructions:

 

Download the Jafza app by searching the app in App store or Play store with the name ‚ÄúJAFZA‚Äù:

 

Register by clicking the ‚ÄúSign Up‚Äù link, which will navigate to the below registration steps to enter:

 

1) Card Number: 1179547

2) Passport Number      

3) Date of Birth

 

On the successful validation, please enter your Mobile Number and Email Address to receive the One Time Password (OTP). The successful OTP verification will allow you to set up the Jafza App Password.

 

Once that is done, you can view the soft copy of your card as physical cards are not available anymore.

 

Our Admin team will approve your signing up shortly.

 

Don‚Äôt forget to share with me the new photo for your emirates id.

 

Regards,
